rawText:
Surya Murugan 
Python Developer | Software Developer  
Current City: Mumbai 
Email: surya.murugan.2026@gmail.com | Phone: 9967137495 
LinkedIn GitHub 
Professional Summary 
Results-driven Software and AI Developer with expertise in Python, SQL, and Django, specializing in 
machine learning, deep learning (FastAI, Hugging Face), and AI-driven applications. Experienced in 
developing finance-focused AI tools, Chrome extensions, and trading automation. Strong problem-solving 
skills with a passion for building scalable AI solutions. Seeking opportunities to apply AI and software 
development expertise to drive innovation. 
 
Professional Experience 
Jr. Software Developer 
Sapat International Pvt Ltd | April 2024 – Present 
● Develop and maintain scalable backend applications using Python and Flask. 
● Design and manage RESTful APIs to enable seamless system integration. 
● Customize and extend Odoo ERP modules to meet specific business needs. 
● Enhance OpenedX LMS by implementing tailored features for better e-learning experiences. 
● Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-performance, reliable applications. 
● Utilize Open Hands platform to build and deploy AI-powered automation solutions. 
 
Education 
Bachelor of Computer Engineering (BE) 
Saraswati College of Engineering (Mumbai University) | Graduation: 2023 
● Graduated with 7.48 CGPA (67.81%) 
HSC (Biofocal Science : Electronics) 
Arya Gurukul International Jr College, Navi Mumbai, 2018 
● Graduated with 64%
 
Technical Skills 
● Programming Languages: Python 
● Frameworks: Flask, Django, FastAPI, Streamlit 
● Web Development: HTML, CSS, Javascript 
● Backend Development: REST APIs, Performance Optimization 
● AI/ML Tools: Scikit-learn, OpenAI, LangGraph, HuggingFace 
● Automation:BeautifulSoup, Agentic AI, Workflow Automation 
● ERP Systems: Odoo (Customization & Extension) 
● LMS Platforms: OpenedX (Customization & Development) 

● Cloud Services: AWS (S3, Lambda, DynamoDB,EC2) 
● Databases: SQL, NoSQL 
● Data Processing: Web Scraping (BeautifulSoup), HTML/XML Parsing 
● Version Control: Git 
● Soft Skills: Communication, Collaboration, Problem-Solving, Mentorship 
 
Key Projects 
● QR4Order API: Developed a QR-based ordering system API for the F&B sector. 
 
● Customized OpenedX LMS: Enhanced e-learning platforms with custom feature development. 
● Event Job Portal – Developed a dynamic job portal using Django,WebSockets, enabling real-time 
communication, social interactions, and recruiter-employee engagement. 
● Mental Health Companion – Built an AI-powered platform integrating ML models and web 
scraping to assess mental health and recommend nearby therapists. Optimized performance using 
Redis caching. 
 
Achievements & Certifications 
● Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification - DeepLearning.AI 
● AI Agent Fundamentals - HuggingFace 
 
Interests & Personal Development 
● Deep learning with Generative AI (LLMs) 
● Exploring automation and AI productivity tools 
● Staying updated with emerging technologies through continuous learning
